sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.JWTTokenRestricted</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>JWTTokenRestricted</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var JWTTokenRestricted = Class.create();
JWTTokenRestricted.prototype = Object.extend(new JWTTokenInternal(), {
    initialize: function(jwtProviderID) {
		JWTTokenInternal.prototype.initialize.call(this,jwtProviderID);
    },
	
	isAllowedToGenerateJWT: function() {
		if (!gs.isLoggedIn())
			return false;

		if ('system' == gs.getSession().getUserName())
			return true;

		var allowed = gs.hasRole('admin') || gs.hasRole('oauth_admin');
		return allowed;	
	},

	type: 'JWTTokenRestricted'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-03-21 23:03:27</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>89c727c6ff10330001d3cd6bd53bf136</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>JWTTokenRestricted</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="OAuth 2.0" source="com.snc.platform.security.oauth">3c4dbc476d2220100acb70b353433044</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_89c727c6ff10330001d3cd6bd53bf136</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-03-22 19:45:08</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>496</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
